bitField.name: BTOS
bitField.desc: write or read busy to scrub delay configuration

bitField.name: SCRUBRATE
bitField.desc: write or read scrub rate period configuration

bitField.name: RUN
bitField.desc: when set run the memory configuration

bitField.name: BPBUSYN
bitField.desc: make controller to ignore busy signal

bitField.name: WENSRAM
bitField.desc: when set write configuration to chip 8 to 1, else read configuration

bitField.name: WASHMEM
bitField.desc: Frame error (FE) - indicates that a framing error was detected. Reset value: ‘0’
